    uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities

    • Uses of AnEntity in uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities

      Subclasses of AnEntity in uk.ac.reading.syrvanser.Entities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Carnivore
      A class for carnivore entities Each entity group has a hierarchic level Only entities which are one level lower can be eaten
      class  Food
      This class represents food that can be eaten by herbivore life forms
      class  Herbivore
      Class for herbivore life forms Those life forms are the only once that can eat objects from the Food class
      class  LifeForm
      Abstract class implementing life forms Stores information about actual position on the screen and definitions for some life form-specific methods
      class  Nest
      Nest class, generates a random entity after a certain amount of time Works as an obstacle
      class  Obstacle
      Obstacle class, immobile object that cannot be walked through
      class  PoisonousFood
      Poisonous food (life forms die when they eat it)
      class  PoisonousHerbivore
      Class for poisonous herbivores (predators die when they eat them)
      class  RenewableFood
      Class for renewable food which regenerates over time Cannot be walked through when it is growing
